author: perezhilton
title: WTF! Kylie Jenner Seriously Sent Some Customers EMPTY Highlighters! CocoPerez.com
text:
Kylie Jenner is facing backlash yet again over her makeup business Kylie Cosmetics !!
As we previously reported , the youngest of Kris Jenner and Caitlyn Jenner 's kids launched her new line of Kylighters AKA highlighters a few weeks ago, and they all sold out in just one day.
Unfortunately, it seems that some people who purchased the $22 product received an empty package in the mail! The fuck??
Related: Everything You Missed During The KUWTK Season 13 Premiere
Customers took to Twitter over the big blunder, revealing their frustration:
It's kind of sad that Kylie still doesn't give a shit about her makeup brand like how you going to give somebody a EMPTY kylighter?
‚Äî skyfall ‚ô†Ô∏è (@livestr0ng_) March 13, 2017
I wouldn't risk paying 20 something dollars for a kylighter or whatever and have it come in empty.
‚Äî caitlynn‚ù£Ô∏è (@kksharp_) March 12, 2017
Waiting for @KylieJenner @kyliecosmetics to address why I have a empty kylighter after waiting 2 weeks to get it pic.twitter.com/2jjtwkPoa5
‚Äî Sit N Pretty (@TomlinsonScylla) March 11, 2017
And you can see the empty palettes (below):
So @kyliecosmetics and @KylieJenner why y'all send me a empty KyLighter container. Somebody needs to be contacting me very soon pic.twitter.com/xIyrmceX2n
‚Äî Lil Eason (@ohfckitsb) March 9, 2017
THERES NO HIGHLIGHTER IN THE COMPACT ITS EMPTY pic.twitter.com/thIGkwZebf
‚Äî brianna üáØüá≤ (@btaylorbeauty) March 8, 2017
What happened to my kylighter? @KylieJenner @kyliecosmetics pic.twitter.com/hsI6QiK1my
‚Äî Carissa Elliott (@ElliottCarissa) March 8, 2017
While Kylie has YET to speak out on the obvious lack of quality control, the Kylie Cosmetics team has at least been contacting those who have spoken out about their empty packages:
I guess if you get enough retweets and likes they'll send you a new kylighter‚Ä¶?üê∏‚òïÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/Q94tCvPxD5
‚Äî jordan byers üëΩ (@jordanebyers) March 9, 2017
Still, it's surprising the 19-year-old wouldn't apologize to her customers.
Super disappointing! But again, her highlighters sold out after a second restock.
CLICK HERE for five powders just as amazing that WON"T come up empty!

Tags: beauty buzz , business blitz , highlighter , kylie cosmetics , kylie jenner , kylighter , kylighter scandal , twitter
